Description: Upper section of a steatite shabti of Pediamenope affixed to object St.19 to form a single object: a lappet wig, a carved face and ears, an incised collar, crossed hands in low relief holding the low relief hoes, the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in six(surviving) rows of Hieroglyphs that almost encircle the body, the back of one arm decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket, the ankle and foot section is missing.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: George Annesley, 2nd Earl of Mountnorris
Condition: incomplete - ankle and foot section missing
